pkgmetadata.longdescription: Persian Text Mining Tool for Co-Occurrence Network // Provides an extension to 'MadanText' for creating and analyzing co- occurrence networks in Persian text data. This package mainly makes use of the 'PersianStemmer' (Safshekan, R., et al. (2019). https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=PersianStemmer), 'udpipe' (Wijffels, J., et al. (2023). https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=udpipe), and 'shiny' (Chang, W., et al. (2023). https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shiny) packages.
